doc.title: Surviving
doc.plot: Vivian returns from the hospital after a severe car accident, to the home of her best friend Gabrielle and her husband Michael. She moves in believing that their home is the only place she can heal her physical and emotional wounds. Vivian's mother disagrees with her decision, but this is not the only decision Vivian must live with. Her attraction to Michael proves difficult to resist. Gabrielle's love and friendship will be tested as she helps her best friend heal her wounds. As Vivian's physical wounds fade away, she must confront her demons in order to move on to a brighter future, but nothing ever goes as planned and nothing is as it seems.
